## Public Member Functions

### calculate() {#ad67d6b7f9f91a2d5852b0f9aebfe542a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LiveIntervalCalc::calculate (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp; LI, bool TrackSubRegs)</>}>
Calculates liveness for the register specified in live interval <code>LI</code>.

Creates subregister live ranges as needed if subreg liveness tracking is enabled.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveintervalcalc-h/#l00061">61</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveintervalcalc-h">LiveIntervalCalc.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveintervalcalc-cpp/#l00041">41</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveintervalcalc-cpp">LiveIntervalCalc.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### constructMainRangeFromSubranges() {#af5198110c0058e3d60524eecf500ee51}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LiveIntervalCalc::constructMainRangeFromSubranges (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp; LI)</>}>
For live interval <code>LI</code> with correct SubRanges construct matching information for the main live range.

Expects the main live range to not have any segments or value numbers.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveintervalcalc-h/#l00066">66</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveintervalcalc-h">LiveIntervalCalc.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveintervalcalc-cpp/#l00105">105</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveintervalcalc-cpp">LiveIntervalCalc.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### createDeadDefs() {#a1c36b75f4a0dac1a833a459617f03c76}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LiveIntervalCalc::createDeadDefs (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange">LiveRange</a> &amp; LR, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Reg)</>}>
createDeadDefs - Create a dead def in LI for every def operand of Reg.

Each instruction defining Reg gets a new <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vninfo">VNInfo</a> with a corresponding minimal live range.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveintervalcalc-h/#l00048">48</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveintervalcalc-h">LiveIntervalCalc.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveintervalcalc-cpp/#l00122">122</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveintervalcalc-cpp">LiveIntervalCalc.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### extendToUses() {#ae3bff863d5f2c5df37ef42d76e457f74}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::LiveIntervalCalc::extendToUses (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange">LiveRange</a> &amp; LR, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> PhysReg)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Extend the live range of <code>LR</code> to reach all uses of Reg.

All uses must be jointly dominated by existing liveness. PHI-defs are inserted as needed to preserve SSA form.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveintervalcalc-h/#l00054">54</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveintervalcalc-h">LiveIntervalCalc.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Functions

### extendToUses() {#abf0d796c3c3e4edc136150896749a589}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LiveIntervalCalc::extendToUses (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange">LiveRange</a> &amp; LR, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Reg, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lanebitmask">LaneBitmask</a> LaneMask, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &#42; LI=nullptr)</>}>
Extend the live range of <code>LR</code> to reach all uses of Reg.

If <code>LR</code> is a main range, or if <code>LI</code> is null, then all uses must be jointly dominated by the definitions from <code>LR</code>. If <code>LR</code> is a subrange of the live interval <code>LI</code>, corresponding to lane mask <code>LaneMask</code>, all uses must be jointly dominated by the definitions from <code>LR</code> together with definitions of other lanes where <code>LR</code> becomes undefined (via &lt;def,read-undef&gt; operands). If <code>LR</code> is a main range, the <code>LaneMask</code> should be set to ~0, i.e. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lanebitmask/#a3714a639930eab71d7202da05ad82990">LaneBitmask::getAll()</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveintervalcalc-h/#l00039">39</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveintervalcalc-h">LiveIntervalCalc.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveintervalcalc-cpp/#l00134">134</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveintervalcalc-cpp">LiveIntervalCalc.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
